hmm, it sonly has gnome xchat there not the real xchat
the "xchat" package is Xchat. the "xchat-gnome" package is Xchat Gnome.
sudo apt-get install xchat installs real xchat.
Have you done "sudo apt-get update" yet? If not, that would be a good start.
(and then "sudo apt-get install xchat" should work)

System -> Administration -> Software Sources, see if "Community-maintained Open Source software (universe)" is checked.
check it, press close, press reload, try installing xchat again.
